title: Climate protesters shut down intersections across D.C.
text:
Hundreds of climate protesters halted traffic across the city for the “Shutdown D.C.” protest Monday morning.

Intersections near Farragut Square, Columbus Circle, Folger Park and Hancock Park were blocked off by people chanting “We demand a green new deal!”

Metropolitan Police Department officers were on the scene, slowly attempting to remove protesters from the middle of the street to re-open the intersection of 16th and K streets in the northwest section of the city.

This protest follows youth-lead climate rallies across the world last week.
